wikipedia_page.main: Harry Butterworth (22 November 1867 – 30 November 1954) was a British fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1912 Summer Olympics in Stockholm.He was also the coach of Swedish football club Hammarby IF in 1920.
